Posts.Content: Hi just wondering if anyone on here with triple negative has had a double mastectomy at all? I’m seeing surgeon next week and considering all options at the moment. Especially as triple negative has a higher chance of reoccurring compared to others. My anxiety is bad at the moment,any thoughts? Thanks x
Posts.Title: Mastectomy worry

Posts.Content: hiya this is may 1st ever post. I have been on tamoxifen for about a year and i have been getting awful cramp in the arch of my foot and toes, worse when walking and driving. Tried telling my GP about it but was dismissed immediately and told to see a chiropodist! I'm due to see my oncologist next month so will ask him, must admit it never entered my head that it could be related to tamoxifen
Posts.Title: Tamoxifen and muscle cramps
